message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Can you meet me in the middle?

I understand that $15000 might be a stretch, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $12500. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal considering the product's value. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you meet me in the middle again?

I understand that $12500 is still a bit high for you, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $10000. I can offer it to you for $11750. This is the best I can do, and I think it's still a great deal. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still think $11750 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm willing to meet you halfway on this one. I can offer it to you for $11250. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I'm getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept, but I'm still not ready to give in. I can offer it to you for $11000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower. What do you think?
I'm not willing to go above $10000, and I'm not interested in going over budget. I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at this price. I'll offer $9500 for the product. This is my final offer.
